snippet.title: Montezuma's Return! [GB] - Real Time Longplay (No death)
snippet.description:
This is a, no commentary, Longplay of Montezuma's Return! for Game Boy. Another classic platformer with decent graphics and music. In this playthrough I finish the game without dying (No death run) but I don't collect everything because there are 2 locations near the end of game, where you have to kill yourself to collect some diamonds. Max lives (9) achieved.

For a run showing all pickups and rooms, you can watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IhO8CBUJRLU

Please note this is not the same version as in Game Boy Color. The difficulty in GBC is scaled down since there are easier jumps at some points, some traps have been removed or made them easier to pass, there are a lot more diamonds(=1UPs) to collect and more daggers to kill enemies/bosses.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game is played by me in one go. No save states/cheats have been used. Recorded in VBA23.2.

Please note I uploaded it just for fun, no intention to compete anyone.
